author: ekimai
title: Green?
review:
Don't get me wrong - I like the PF suite of products.  It seems to me that for the last 20 years battery manufacturers have been developing and improving rechargeable batteries that are smaller and lighter, and result in less waste.

While you can use rechargeable AA batteries in this set, they can be heavy, and the whole power pack can be bulky.

It's good, but it's not right.

author: Si_UKNZ
title: a poor comparison to the aaa box
review:
Much cheaper than the new aaa battery box, but way too heavy and unnecassarily bulky. The weight alone requires doubling up of motors in moving vehicles just to move the thing around. The appendages sticking out aren't needed and just add to the bulk, and even the switch is too big. It's non-standard width rounds off a poor design.

The aaa box is better in every way except price.
